verses.verse: Let <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>person<s%> be in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> to the <S%G5242>governing<s%> <S%G1849>authorities.<s%> For there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> from <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> which <S%G1510>exist<s%> are <S%G5021>established<s%> by <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> he who <S%G436>resists<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> has <S%G436>opposed<s%> the <S%G1296>ordinance<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and they who have <S%G436>opposed<s%> will <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation<s%> upon <S%G1438>themselves.<s%>

For <S%G758>rulers<s%> are not a <S%G5401>cause<s%> of <S%G5401>fear<s%> for <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>behavior,<s%> but for <S%G2556>evil.<s%> Do you <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G5399>have<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5399>fear<s%> of <S%G1849>authority<s%>? <S%G4160>Do<s%> <S%G18>what<s%> is <S%G18>good,<s%> and you will <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> from the <S%G846>same;<s%>

for it is a <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to you for <S%G18>good.<s%> But <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2556>what<s%> is <S%G2556>evil,<s%> be <S%G5399>afraid;<s%> for it does not <S%G5409>bear<s%> the <S%G3162>sword<s%> for <S%G1500>nothing;<s%> for it is a <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> an <S%G1558>avenger<s%> who brings <S%G3709>wrath<s%> upon the one who <S%G4238>practices<s%> <S%G2556>evil.<s%>

<S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> it is <S%G318>necessary<s%> to be in <S%G5293>subjection,<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> for conscience' <S%G1223>sake.<s%>

For <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5055>pay<s%> <S%G5411>taxes,<s%> for [rulers] are <S%G3011>servants<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G4342>devoting<s%> <S%G4342>themselves<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G3778>thing.<s%>

<S%G591>Render<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3782>what<s%> is <S%G3782>due<s%> them: <S%G5411>tax<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5411>tax<s%> [is due;] <S%G5056>custom<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5056>custom;<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5401>fear;<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5092>honor.<s%>

<S%G3784>Owe<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> to <S%G3367>anyone<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> to <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another;<s%> for he who <S%G25>loves<s%> his <S%G2087>neighbor<s%> has <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> [the] <S%G3551>law.<s%>

For <S%G3588>this,<s%> "You shall not <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> You shall not <S%G5407>murder,<s%> You shall not <S%G2813>steal,<s%> You shall not <S%G1937>covet,<s%>" and <S%G1487>if<s%> there is <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> it is <S%G346>summed<s%> up in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> "You shall <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G4572>yourself.<s%>"

And <S%G3778>this<s%> [do,] <S%G3609>knowing<s%> the <S%G2540>time,<s%> that it is <S%G2235>already<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> for you to <S%G1453>awaken<s%> from <S%G5258>sleep;<s%> for <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> is <S%G1451>nearer<s%> to us <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> we <S%G4100>believed.<s%>

The <S%G3571>night<s%> is <S%G4298>almost<s%> <S%G4298>gone,<s%> and the <S%G2250>day<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand.<s%> Let us <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G659>lay<s%> <S%G659>aside<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%> and <S%G1746>put<s%> on the <S%G3696>armor<s%> of <S%G5457>light.<s%>

Let us <S%G4043>behave<s%> <S%G2156>properly<s%> as in the <S%G2250>day,<s%> not in <S%G2970>carousing<s%> and <S%G3178>drunkenness,<s%> not in <S%G2845>sexual<s%> <S%G2845>promiscuity<s%> and <S%G766>sensuality,<s%> not in <S%G2054>strife<s%> and <S%G2205>jealousy.<s%>

But <S%G1746>put<s%> on the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4307>provision<s%> for the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> in <S%G1519>regard<s%> to [its] <S%G1939>lusts.<s%>
